verses.roman:
evaṁ-vidhāni janmāni
karmāṇi ca jagat-pateḥ
bhūrīṇi bhūri-yaśaso
varṇitāni mahā-bhuja

synonyms: evam-vidhāni—just like these; janmāni—appearances; karmāṇi—activities; ca—and; jagat-pateḥ—of the Lord of the universe; bhūrīṇi—innumerable; bhūri-yaśasaḥ—very glorious; varṇitāni—described; mahā-bhuja—O mighty-armed King Nimi.
translation: O mighty-armed King, there are innumerable appearances and activities of the Supreme Lord of the universe similar to those I have already mentioned. In fact, the glories of the Supreme Lord are unlimited.
